description: Limit system access to authorized users and devices.
Limit information system access to the types of transactions and functions that authorized users are permitted to execute.
Authenticate (or verify) the identities of users, processes, or devices.
Sanitize or destroy information system media containing Federal Contract Information before disposal or release.
Monitor, control, and protect organizational communications.
Ensure actions of individual users can be uniquely traced.
Periodically assess the risk to organizational operations.
Track, review, and approve/disapprove changes to the system.
Identify, report, and correct system flaws in a timely manner.
